def robot_move(y_r,x_r,df_l,m_r):
    
    if m_r == '^':
        x_m = 0
        y_m = -1
        q = f"y < {y_r} & x == {x_r}"
        fl = -1
    elif m_r == '>':
        x_m = 1
        y_m = 0
        q = f"y == {y_r} & x > {x_r}"
        fl = 0
    elif m_r == 'v':
        x_m = 0
        y_m = 1
        q = f"y > {y_r} & x == {x_r}"
        fl = 0
    elif m_r == '<':
        x_m = -1
        y_m = 0
        q = f"y == {y_r} & x < {x_r}"
        fl = -1

    look_ahead = df_l.loc[(y_r + y_m, x_r + x_m)][0]

    if look_ahead == '#':
        # do nothing
        nothing = True
        # print (f"    See: {look_ahead} stop")
    elif look_ahead == '.':
        # remove rebot reference
        df_l.loc[(y_r, x_r)] = '.'

        # move
        y_r = y_r + y_m
        x_r = x_r + x_m

        # place rebot reference
        df_l.loc[(y_r, x_r)] = '@'

        #print (f"    See: {look_ahead} move a step")
    else:
        # evaluate
        iBoxCnt = 0
        iSpaceCnt = 0
        df_ahead = df_locations.query(q)['contents']
        while (iSpaceCnt == 0) & (iBoxCnt < df_ahead.shape[0]):
            #print(df_ahead.tolist())
            if (m_r == '^') | (m_r == '<'):
                location_content = df_ahead.iloc[fl-iBoxCnt]
            else:
                location_content = df_ahead.iloc[fl+iBoxCnt]

            if location_content == '.':
                iSpaceCnt = 1
            elif location_content == '#':
                iBoxCnt = df_ahead.shape[0]
            else:
                iBoxCnt += 1

        # move
        if iSpaceCnt > 0:
            #print (f"    See: {look_ahead} space found in {iBoxCnt} steps, {df_ahead.shape[0]} positions")

            # remove rebot reference
            df_l.loc[(y_r, x_r)] = '.'

            # move
            y_r = y_r + y_m
            x_r = x_r + x_m

            # place rebot reference
            df_l.loc[(y_r, x_r)] = '@'

            # place box
            df_l.loc[(y_r + (y_m*iBoxCnt), x_r + (x_m*iBoxCnt))] = 'O'
        else:
            nothing = True
            # print (f"    See: {look_ahead} but no space found")
    
    return y_r, x_r, df_l
